overview: This is a movie that focuses on survival and faces death. The bald head and his parents and grandpa's family stayed on the mountain. The family made tea for a living, and the days were monotonous and calm. In the fall, bald experienced some things: his friends taking a trip to work; he has not the beginning of the end of love; a good friend of sudden death; and the failure of the marriage; Big Brother house the child's birth; grandfather died ......Continue as usual, just like the heavy snow on the mountain.
title: On the Mountain
